column4: hi, i have installed ubuntu 8.04. i want to find grub etc menu.lst but its not there?!?!?!? i know it has put grub loader to start on windows which is on first drive but i cannot see any change there... what do i do?
well use the tab key to auto complete use the correct case
yeah, but install 10.04 anyway, the version you are using is very out of date
then you dont have a menu.lst
it is on whatever one you currently boot from?
